name: FPShop
description:
FPShop is a game about collecting funds by destroying the enemy droids and using said funds to buy weapons, to destroy even more enemies. Each round only lasts 5 minutes, so be quick and accurate to get as much money as possible!!

Made for a University submission by myself, and Music by wonderful Alexandra Silvana Dabija.

Try to beat my personal high score, 20,920 HUF!

Have fun!
